sqlMap.select: select d.id,d.device_id,d.device_type,d.device_status,d.device_tel,d.device_phone, ifnull((select m.name from mj_residential m where m.id in(select residentail_id from mj_build_unit where type=2 and id=d.unit)),'未绑定') residentail, ifnull((select b.name from mj_build_unit b where b.type=1 and b.id in(select parent_id from mj_build_unit where type=2 and id=d.unit)),'未绑定') build, ifnull((select t.name from mj_build_unit t where t.type=2 and t.id=d.unit),'未绑定') unit from mj_device d where d.id = #id#
select d.id,d.device_id deviceId,d.device_type deviceType,d.device_status deviceStatus,d.device_tel deviceTel,d.device_phone devicePhone from mj_device d where d.unit = #unitId#

select d.id,d.device_id deviceId,d.device_type deviceType,d.device_status deviceStatus,d.device_tel deviceTel,d.device_phone devicePhone from mj_device d where d.unit in (select id from mj_build_unit where type = 2 and residentail_id = #residentail#)

select d.id,d.device_id,d.device_type,d.device_status,d.device_tel,d.device_phone, ifnull((select m.name from mj_build_unit u,mj_residential m where m.id=u.residentail_id and u.type=1 and u.id in(select parent_id from mj_build_unit where type=2 and id=d.unit)),'未绑定') residentail, ifnull((select b.name from mj_build_unit b where b.type=1 and b.id in(select parent_id from mj_build_unit where type=2 and id=d.unit)),'未绑定') build, ifnull((select t.name from mj_build_unit t where t.type=2 and t.id=d.unit),'未绑定') unit from mj_device d
d.device_id like '%$deviceId$%'
d.device_type = #deviceType#
d.device_status = #deviceStatus#
d.unit in(select t2.id from mj_residential t1,mj_build_unit t2 where t2.TYPE =2 and t1.id=t2.residentail_id and t1.name like '%$residentailName$%')
d.create_user in (SELECT mid FROM manager_user WHERE manager_company=#createUserCompany#)
d.create_user IN (SELECT mid FROM manager_user WHERE manager_province = #createUserProvince#)
d.create_user IN (SELECT mid FROM manager_user WHERE manager_city = #createUserCity#)
d.create_user IN (SELECT mid FROM manager_user WHERE manager_residentail = #createUserResidentail#)

SELECT count(1) from mj_device d
d.device_id like '%$deviceId$%'
d.device_type = #deviceType#
d.device_status = #deviceStatus#
d.unit in(select t2.id from mj_residential t1,mj_build_unit t2 where t2.TYPE =2 and t1.id=t2.residentail_id and t1.name like '%$residentailName$%')
d.create_user in (SELECT mid FROM manager_user WHERE manager_company=#createUserCompany#)
d.create_user IN (SELECT mid FROM manager_user WHERE manager_province = #createUserProvince#)
d.create_user IN (SELECT mid FROM manager_user WHERE manager_city = #createUserCity#)
d.create_user IN (SELECT mid FROM manager_user WHERE manager_residentail = #createUserResidentail#)
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE mj_device
device_status = #deviceStatus#
device_type = #deviceType#
device_tel = #deviceTel#
device_phone = #devicePhone#
WHERE id = #id#
sqlMap.select:
select d.id,d.device_id,d.device_type,d.device_status,d.device_tel,d.device_phone, ifnull((select m.name from mj_build_unit u,mj_residential m where m.id=u.parent_id and u.type=0 and u.id in(select parent_id from mj_build_unit where type=1 and id=d.unit)),'未绑定') residentail, ifnull((select b.name from mj_build_unit b where b.type=0 and b.id in(select parent_id from mj_build_unit where type=1 and id=d.unit)),'未绑定') build, ifnull((select t.name from mj_build_unit t where t.type=1 and t.id=d.unit),'未绑定') unit from mj_device d where d.unit is null
d.device_id = #deviceId#
d.device_type = #deviceType#
d.device_status = #deviceStatus#
d.unit in(select t2.id from mj_residential t1,mj_build_unit t2 where t2.TYPE =2 and t1.id=t2.residentail_id and t1.name like '%$residentailName$%')

SELECT count(1) from mj_device d where d.unit is null
d.device_id = #deviceId#
d.device_type = #deviceType#
d.device_status = #deviceStatus#
d.unit in(select t2.id from mj_residential t1,mj_build_unit t2 where t2.TYPE =2 and t1.id=t2.residentail_id and t1.name like '%$residentailName$%')
sqlMap.update: UPDATE mj_device set unit = #unitId# where id = #deviceId#
UPDATE mj_device set unit=null where id = #deviceId#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO mj_device(device_id,device_type,device_status,device_tel,device_phone,create_user) SELECT device_id,device_type,device_status,device_tel,device_phone,create_user FROM mj_device_temp WHERE device_id NOT IN (SELECT device_id FROM mj_device)
